text: Zandberg is a hamlet in the Dutch province of Gelderland. It is a part of the municipality of Buren, and lies about 9 km northwest of Tiel.ANWB Topografische Atlas Nederland, Topografische Dienst and ANWB, 2005. ==References== Category:Populated places in Gelderland Category:Buren
title: Zandberg, Gelderland
